content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <OpenSearchDescription xmlns="http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/"> <ShortName>ERDDAP</ShortName> <Description>The ERDDAP at NOAA NMFS SWFSC Environmental Research Division is a data server that gives you a simple, consistent way to download subsets of scientific datasets in common file formats and make graphs and maps.</Description> <Url type="application/atom+xml" template="http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/opensearch1.1/search?searchTerms={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}&itemsPerPage={count?}&format=atom"/> <Url type="application/rss+xml" template="http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/opensearch1.1/search?searchTerms={searchTerms}&page={startPage?}&itemsPerPage={count?}&format=rss"/> <Contact>bob.simons@noaa.gov</Contact> <Tags>atmosphere biology biosphere earth environment ocean science</Tags> <LongName>ERDDAP</LongName> <Image height="56" width="55">http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/nlogo.gif</Image> <Image height="313" width="313">http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/noaa_simple.gif</Image> <Image height="20" width="20">http://coastwatch.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/images/noaa20.gif</Image> <Query role="example" searchTerms="temperature" /> <Developer>Bob Simons (bob.simons at noaa.gov)</Developer> <Attribution>NOAA NMFS SWFSC Environmental Research Division</Attribution> <SyndicationRight>open</SyndicationRight> <AdultContent>false</AdultContent> <Language>en-us</Language> <InputEncoding>UTF-8</InputEncoding> <OutputEncoding>UTF-8</OutputEncoding> </OpenSearchDescription>
